title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: None Definition of surface : Kronig-Penny model, surface structure, adsorption, space charge and surface states, field effect, surface capacitance, surface recombination, contact potential and surface photo-voltage, transport processes, surface characterization by diffraction, spectroscopy and electrochemical techniques. Metal-semiconductor junction, p-n junctions, MOS and MIS structures
